basic_information.scholarship_name: Robert Glenn Rapp Scholar Incentive Award-NOMINATION

description: This scholarship was established in 2004 to provide scholarship assistance to an incoming freshman of the UCO School of Music who demonstrates high academic achievement. The Robert Glenn Rapp Foundation has graciously funded this and many other important scholarship initiatives for the students of our School of Music. Recipient must display a high level of artistry in your area. Eligibility Incoming Freshman Music Major Graduate from High School with 3.0+ GPA Enrolled Full-Time (12+ Hours) Oklahoma Resident ACT Score 22+ Requirements Display High Level of Artistry in Your Area Two Teacher Recommendation Letters Recipient required to write a brief essay about any class or performance activities.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
